segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster, I can't stand it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing out of the sink like thatâ€”filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle, probably ruining her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, just wiping that plate while everything floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting soaked, who knows what damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balancing on that stool, about to make it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for a cookie like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slippery and gross soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat, but inside? Ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such carelessness in a home like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unnecessary and revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR
